meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a zone.
meanings.sent1: The zonal climate in this area is known for its consistent temperatures.
meanings.sent2: The map displayed the zonal divisions of the city for easy navigation.
meanings.sent3: The zonal arrangement of the garden made it look like a colorful patchwork quilt.
meanings.sent4: Her zonal approach to organizing her closet helped her find things quickly.
meanings.sent5: The zonal markings on the road indicated different speed limits for each section.

meanings.sent1: The zonal seating plan ensured each group had their designated area.
meanings.sent2: The zonal distribution of resources helped in efficient management.
meanings.sent3: The zonal layout of the classroom made it easy for the teacher to monitor all students.
meanings.sent4: The zonal organization of the event made it run smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The zonal allocation of tasks ensured everyone knew their responsibilities.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a zone or zones.
meanings.sent1: The zonal regulations were put in place to maintain order.
meanings.sent2: The zonal policy aimed to protect the natural habitats.
meanings.sent3: The zonal restrictions limited the development in certain areas.
meanings.sent4: The zonal boundaries were clearly marked on the map.
meanings.sent5: The zonal guidelines helped in defining the permissible activities.
